1578600.name: RPG Maker MZ - Sci-Fi Battler Pack
1578600.description:
Are you on the lookout for some incredible battlers to use in your futuristic and science-fiction games? Look no further!

Sci-Fi Battler pack is filled with androids, aliens, and sophisticated machinery - the essentials you need in your space adventure. Hand-painted by Michael Galefire, this pack is a perfect companion to his Sci-Fi Battlebacks.

FEATURES:

Hand-painted battlers, sized for use in RPG Maker MZ.
25 Battlers, ranging from smaller enemies to large bosses.
Aliens, androids, robot weapons, mutants and more.
Royalty-free use in your RPG Maker projects!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series only
* OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker Series
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1578600.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
